author: The Editorial Board
title: More Competition for Pharma
text:
President Trump last week laid out a plan to reduce the cost of prescription drugs, and the press sniped that he sold out to the pharmaceutical industry. So irony alert: One of the Administration’s first actions is to call out drug companies that appear to be trying to evade competition.
On Thursday Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Scott Gottlieb announced that the agency would publish a list of companies that have “potentially” tried to forestall competition from generic alternatives. More competition from generics...
